name: Lynks
description: Extension to model inspection data links

_matrix.description: Matrix for affine transformations of size (4,4) filled with decimal numbers.

+lynksFormat.description: File format key that indicated the interpreter of the resource content if an URL is defined.

+lynksTransformation.description: Affine transformation matrix of size (4,4) to transform the resource content to the coordinate system of the parent (or if no parent existing to the global coordinates).

+lynksExternalUrl.description: URL to a file location for the resource content.

+lynksRelations.description: Map for resource relations referenced by ids.
